title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The item is a magnificent war axe, perfectly crafted with a blend of elegance and ferocity. Its blade features intricate golden filigree, shaped like a predatory bird's claw, hinting at its lethal potential. A stunning blue gem is embedded at the center, radiating an otherworldly glow that suggests magical properties. The axe's handle is sleek and jet-black, providing a sturdy grip while maintaining an air of sophistication. This weapon is not only a tool of destruction but also a symbol of power, ideal for any warrior seeking to dominate the battlefield and instill fear in their foes.
